claims.claim: Educational curricula should include practical skills for building confidence and understanding.
claims.quote: I envision my curriculum being in all schools across Detroit for youth that allow them to be able to build confidence, build understanding

claims.claim: Connecting youth with successful professionals can accelerate their path to success.
claims.quote: the more bosses I can connect with, the more bosses we can get to come and connect and input in the youth. The skills that are needed, how can we cut the time that it takes for them to be successful?

claims.claim: Youth programs should address hunger and teach about nutritional content in food.
claims.quote: urban Community Outreach, where our focus is youth hunger how can we teach the youth to understand what's in their food to better build them and be able to be. Productive citizens in the community

claims.claim: Individual success should positively impact and contribute to the community's success.
claims.quote: if I'm succeeding, I should be able to connect with those next to me and help them to succeed.

claims.claim: Personal experiences of lacking guidance should motivate the creation of supportive programs for youth.
claims.quote: Just trying to do the work of person that I needed when I was young.
